name: Mushroom Season
description:
Welcome to Mushroom Season!

It's the time of year when the popshrooms come out and wander around. What are popshrooms? They are mushrooms with a special quality that, when launched at high velocities, makes them very dangerous projectiles. 

However, there is a mysterious being who terrorizes and even EATS them!

You are a robot sent out from the government to protect these mushrooms from extinction. Armed with only a vacuum gun, you begin your quest...

---- HOW TO PLAY ----

Collect popshrooms with your vacuum gun and get them to safety in the Cave.

Once you have deposited a popshroom in the Cave, you can then use it wherever you want as ammo. If you die or lose it somehow, it will always respawn in the Cave, so you won't have to find it again. 

W, D to move left and right

S to open doors

SPACE to jump

Right, Left click; K, J to vacuum/shoot mushrooms
